title: Drawing, "International Casino: Second Floor", May 21, 1937
medium: Graphite and red colored pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE, NEW YORK CITY; see inscription
inscribed: Architect's stamp inscribed in graphite: 546-64; 1/4"=1'-0"; INT. CASINO; SAENGER / 5/4/37 / 5/21/37; 6/15/37, 1, BRECKER / ", 2, WEISS / 6/16/37, 5,BRECKER / 8/18., 1., N.Y. TEL. Co / 9/3/37, 1, OFFICE. Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 2ND. FLOOR. LAYOUT. Inscribed in graphite throughout with descriptions; in red pencil with calculations and dimensions. Inscribed in red pencil on verso: INTERNATIONAL.
description: Floor plan of second floor, International Casino, New York City. Continuous bench on left wall, faced with row of white rectangular tables. Three rows of round tables each with four chairs at right. Dance floor in lower left corner. Opening to space below in center of room at left, tables and chairs surrounding perimeter of opening, staircase to descend at upper left of opening. Bench, tables, and chairs on upper wall at left. Bench, tables and chairs at lower wall. Irregular shaped room extends at lower right into hall filled with tables and chairs. Indication of color of tables, chairs throughout drawing, either white, red, black (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Second Floor", May 21, 1937.
May 21, 1937. Graphite and red colored pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-266.
